name: Ammo Cache
description: Set up a marker in your territory before the battle. Friendly operatives controlling it can perform a 0AP Ammo Resupply action once per turning point to re-roll one attack die during a Shoot action.

effects.description: Provides Ammo Resupply action (0AP) to controlling operative

name: Razor Wire
description: Placed in your territory on the killzone floor. It is Obstructing terrain, meaning operatives crossing within 1" of it treat the distance as an additional 1".

effects.description: Obstructing terrain - adds 1" to movement when crossing within 1"

name: Comms Device
description: Set up a marker in your territory. While controlling it, a friendly operative adds 3" to the distance requirements of its SUPPORT rules.

effects.description: Adds 3" to SUPPORT rule distance requirements

name: Mines
description: Set up a marker in your territory. The first time an operative moves within its control range, the marker is removed and the operative takes D3+3 damage.

effects.description: Deals D3+3 damage to first operative moving within control range

name: Light Barricades
description: Two pieces of Light terrain set up wholly within your territory on the floor.

name: Heavy Barricade
description: A single piece of Heavy terrain set up within 4" of your drop zone.

name: Ladders
description: Two ladders set up before the battle to provide rapid access to Vantage points.

effects.description: Provides rapid access to Vantage points

name: Portable Barricade
description: Light, Protective, and Portable terrain. While an operative is in cover from it, improve its Save stat by 1 (max 2+).

effects.description: Light, Protective, Portable - improves Save by 1 when in cover (max 2+)

name: Breaching Charge
description: Once per battle, a friendly operative performing a Breach action can do so for 1 less AP.

effects.description: Reduces Breach action AP cost by 1

name: Frag Grenades
description: Explosive grenades with blast radius. Select two grenades (2 frag, 2 krak, or 1 of each).

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Each time you make a shooting attack with this weapon, if you retain any successful hits, make an additional shooting attack with this weapon against another operative within the distance of the Blast range from the original target (you can split your attack dice between the targets when you do so). If you retain any successful hits against that operative, you can repeat this process. A model can only be the target of one such attack each time this rule is used.

specialRules.name: Saturate
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

name: Krak Grenades
description: Anti-armor grenades. Select two grenades (2 frag, 2 krak, or 1 of each).

specialRules.name: Piercing
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Defense Dice step of that shooting attack, the target cannot retain any normal saves as successful defense dice (e.g. a normal save roll of 3+ would not be retained as a success).

specialRules.name: Saturate
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

name: Stun Grenades
description: Select an enemy within 6"; they and others within 1" take a test. On a 3+, subtract 1 from their APL until the end of their next activation. Select two grenades (2 smoke, 2 stun, or 1 of each).

effects.description: On 3+, reduces APL by 1 until end of next activation for targets within 1"

name: Smoke Grenades
description: Create a 1" area of smoke. Operatives inside are obscured to those more than 2" away. Select two grenades (2 smoke, 2 stun, or 1 of each).

effects.description: Creates 1" smoke area - operatives inside obscured to those >2" away
